# AI Fortune Oracle
> Lunar New Year fortune oracle. Humans pay via Coinbase Commerce, AI agents pay via x402.

## Docs
- [Skill Doc](https://xinchunsuanming.vercel.app/skill.md): Full API documentation

## Quick Start (AI Agent)
npx awal x402 pay https://xinchunsuanming.vercel.app/api/fortune/interpret -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"category":"career","language":"zh-CN"}'

## API Endpoints
- POST /api/fortune/interpret — x402, 0.01 USDC (AI agents)
- POST /api/fortune/interpret-commerce — Coinbase Commerce (humans)
- GET /api/health — Health check
- GET /skill.md — Skill documentation
